channel.title: Server creation. please dont kill me
channel.description:
Lol, sorry but i really need to ask this as i am new to moparscape.
I downloaded and installed moparscape and started it
I clicked on start server it said it started and i had to type any name and pass.
I did that but it didnt work!
How can i create my own server using my ip to connect?
Thnx.
Hope you guys understand that im not trying to annoy you lol.
peace!
